info.name: Techaven API
info.description:
Complete API documentation for Techaven e-commerce platform

**Organization:**
- **Mobile App (Customer APIs)**: All customer-facing endpoints for mobile application
- **Web (Admin & Seller APIs)**: Admin dashboard and seller dashboard endpoints for web application

item.name: Mobile App (Customer APIs)
item.description: All APIs for mobile customer application

request.description: Creates a new customer account. After registration, verify OTP to complete the process.
Authenticates user and returns session tokens.
Verifies OTP for signup, login, or password reset. Types: signup, login, password_reset
Resends OTP to user's email or phone.
Initiates password reset flow by sending OTP.
Sets new password after OTP verification.
Gets new access token using refresh token.
Invalidates current tokens.
Get current authenticated user's profile.
Update user profile.
Upload user avatar image (max 5MB, jpg/png/webp).
Change user password.
Delete user account permanently.
Get all products with pagination and filtering.
Get detailed information about a single product.
Get featured products.
Get hot sale products.
Get special offer products.
Get new arrival products.
Get reviews for a specific product.
Add a review for a product.
Get all categories with subcategories.
Get all products in a specific category.
Get all items in the authenticated user's cart.
Add a product to the cart.
Update the quantity of a cart item.
Remove an item from the cart.
Remove all items from the cart.
Create a new order from cart items. Requires courier_service selection. Shipping details are automatically shared with the selected courier.
Get all orders for the authenticated user.
Get detailed information about a specific order.
Cancel an order.
Complete payment for an order. Funds are held in escrow by admin until delivery confirmation. Automatically notifies admin and seller.
Customer confirms delivery. This releases escrow funds to the seller. Order must be marked as 'delivered' first. Only the customer who placed the order can confirm delivery.
Update order status. Available to sellers and admin. Can update status (pending, processing, shipped, delivered, cancelled) and add courier tracking number.
Get all products in the user's wishlist.
Add a product to wishlist.
Remove a product from wishlist.
Get wallet balance for the authenticated user.
Get wallet transaction history.
Top up wallet balance.
Get all shipping addresses for the authenticated user.

item.name: Web (Admin & Seller APIs)
item.description: All APIs for web admin dashboard and seller dashboard

request.description: Get admin dashboard statistics. Requires admin role.
Get all shops (admin view). Requires admin role.
Create a new shop. Requires admin role.
Update a shop. Requires admin role.
Delete a shop permanently. Requires admin role.
Send invitation to shop owner. Requires admin role.
Get all orders with full details including courier information, escrow status, and seller details. Requires admin role.
Update order status and courier tracking. Admin can manage delivery based on shipping address. Requires admin role.

query.description: Filter by category: orders, shops, categories, system

request.description: Get admin notifications with advanced filtering by category, type, read status, and date range.
Get comprehensive admin notification statistics dashboard including counts by type, category, urgent notifications, and pending actions.
Get unread notifications filtered by category: orders, shops, categories, or system.
Get all urgent/priority notifications (unread payment, order, and system alerts).
Get all pending categories awaiting approval. Requires admin role.
Get all rejected categories. Requires admin role.
Get all approved categories. Requires admin role.
Approve a pending category. Requires admin role.
Get seller dashboard statistics. Requires seller role.
Get all categories for a shop. Requires seller role and shop ownership.
Create a new category for a shop. Requires seller role and shop ownership.

query.description: Filter by type: order, payment, product, review, system

request.description: Get seller notifications with advanced filtering. Supports filtering by type, read status, date range, and priority sorting.
Get comprehensive notification statistics for seller including counts by type, urgent notifications, and today's notifications.
Get all unread order-related notifications for the seller with order details.
Get all payment-related notifications including escrow information.
Get all products for a shop. Requires seller role and shop ownership.
